Belgium:
Pope Gregory VII writes to Theodwin, bishop of Liège, urging him to leave the abbot of Saint-Hubert unmolested.
Death of Theodwin of Liège
China:
The Song diplomat Shen Kuo used court archives to reject Daozong's territorial claims.
A proto-Bessemer process was first observed in Cizhou.
Germany: Investiture controversy: A council held at the Lateran Palace concluded that popes alone could appoint, remove and transfer bishops.
Vietnam: Minor officials were chosen by examination for the first time. Lý–Song War: Đại Cồ Việt invaded Song in response to a trade blockade.
